root.name: Touhou 07.5 - Immaterial and Missing Power
root.description: After the events of Perfect Cherry Blossom, even though the cherry-blossom viewing season has passed, the residents of Gensokyo are gathering for feasts that occur once every few days. Each time there is a feast, a restless, spiritual aura slowly awakens. Three days before the next feast is to start, the girls of Gensokyo decide to look for the source of the aura.
